usage.openInNewTerminal: Opens the command in a separate terminal window
usage.separateTerminal: Alternative flag to open in separate terminal (useful for interactive commands)
usage.useCompanion: Opens two terminals - one for execution, one for monitoring
usage.keepTerminalOpen: Keeps the terminal open after command completes (default: true for interactive)
usage.autoResponses: Array of automatic responses to send to the interactive command

autoResponseFields.trigger: Regex pattern to match in output before sending response
autoResponseFields.input: The text to send (include \n for Enter key)
autoResponseFields.delay: Milliseconds to wait before sending the response
autoResponseFields.immediate: Send immediately on start without waiting for output
autoResponseFields.closeAfter: Terminate the session after sending this response
